amendment.description: To add Esther Hobart Morris to a list of suffrage activists.

vote.text: Amendment SA 251 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 251 proposed by Senator Blackburn for Senator Barrasso. (consideration: CR S3197; text: CR S3197) To add Esther Hobart Morris to a list of suffrage activists.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 251 proposed by Senator Blackburn for Senator Barrasso.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 251 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
